Name: Engineer Alpha
About the game: Engineer Alpha is an open world survival and automation game. It combines an infinite editable world, building and connecting of automated machinery into complex assembly lines, with RPG style player progression. Content Editable Voxel World – Build, Mine and, Create within a world that can be completely remade anyway you want. Automated Machinery – Build machines that will craft items for you automatically. Rotational Power Transmission – Transfer power between machines with rotating shafts. Conveyor Belts – Transfer items between machines on automated conveyor belts. Unlock New Technologies – Research new recipes and advance your knowledge. Cranes - Pilot a tower crane and build in a larger area easily. And many more features The Game is still in development but there is a whole lot more planned for the future. Fu Future Content includes Space Age Machinery & Technology Biomes & Caves Farming Vacuum Tubes Fluids Electricity Trains & Freight Containers Blueprints Monsters & Loot Equipment Customization
